level.text: Each licensee shall maintain a pawn record ledger in a form to be approved by the Director.
All transactions in each annual period shall be entered in the ledger by pawn number in strict consecutive numerical order.
All entries shall be in ink and written in the English language.
Each entry in the ledger shall contain the following information:
A description of the article pledged;
The name and address of the pledgor;
A description of the pledgor, as required in D.C. Official Code ยง 47-2884.11;
If unredeemed, the date and disposition at auction; and
The amount collected by redemption or auction of each pledge.
